_header: Hi sunt qui psalmos corrumpunt nequitur almos
_description: Macaronic lines on Tutivillus — four lines in a Latin treatise cautioning priests and other clerics regarding the saying of divine offices

OxfBal354.Transcription:
Versus posterior non prius incipiaturQuam suus anterior perfecto fine
                    fruaturTres sunt qui psalmoscorrumpunt nequiter almosQuos sacra
                    scriptura dampnat vetant quoque iuraMomelers foreskippers ouerskippers sunt
                    tria mala
OxfBal354.Note:
Six lines in this MS, including two lines preceding usual
                    beginning.

CULFf114.Transcription:
Hij sunt qui psalmos corrumpunt nequiter almosOurelepers
                    forskyppers bebbers momelers quoque stutters
